author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
Integrate the following updates to the Run2 HLT master table:
- Updated alpha-T paths, CMSHLT-207
- Dilepton paths for 7E33 CMSHLT-213
- Control path for electron + HT cross trigger, CMSHLT-197
- Update on TOP SingleLepton+Jets paths, CMSHLT-193
- Migration to next ConfDB CMSSW code template
- Fix prescales for HLT_Dimuon0er16_Jpsi_etc, as in a late request on CMSHLT-145
title: Further HLT updates for Run2
